titles.title: Electing officers of the House of Representatives.
Electing officers of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Mr. Becerra demanded that the question be divided on the adoption of the resolution so as to have a separate vote on the election of the Chaplain. Agreed to without objection.
On agreeing to that portion electing the Chaplain Agreed to by voice vote.
On agreeing to the remainder of the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Subsequent to the adoption of the resolution, the Chair announced that, without objection, H. Res. 1 is amended by striking "Florida" in the second place it appears and inserting "Oregon".

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects the following officers of the House of Representatives: (1) Karen L. Haas as Clerk, (2) Wilson S. Livingood as Sergeant at Arms, (3) Daniel J. Strodel as Chief Administrative Officer, and (4) Father Daniel P. Coughlin as Chaplain.
